entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
